title: Gal To Tsuchinoko
alternative_title: ギャルとツチノコ ; Gal & Tsuchinoko ; Gyaru to Tsuchinoko
status: ギャルとツチノコ ; Gal & Tsuchinoko ; Gyaru to Tsuchinoko
description:
Description :
        One day, Nekota-kun, a simple high school boy and encounters an "mythological creature". Impressed by Nekota-kun's extraordinary vigor, Jun-chan, a simple high school gal, decides to go along with Nekota-kun. This is a romantic comedy of encounters with the unknown, starting from a less-than-human level!
